info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued August 21 at 5:45PM EDT until August 22 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT IN EFFECT THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...High wave action, strong currents, and dangerous swimming conditions expected. Piers will be heavily swamped by waves. Waves build to 2 to 4 feet tonight before diminishing Monday afternoon. * WHERE...In Indiana, La Porte county. In Michigan, Berrien county. * WHEN...Through Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Strong currents can pull swimmers into deeper water and high waves can sweep people off piers.
info.instruction: Remain out of the water to avoid hazardous swimming conditions. Do not venture out on piers.
